paragraphs.body: The scene switches to Malina and Maliq's factory, under broad daylight. As smoke rises from the numerous stacks of the factory and blows away in the wind, Sokka and Katara meet with Malina and Maliq.
paragraphs.text: The scene switches to Malina and Maliq's factory, under broad daylight. As smoke rises from the numerous stacks of the factory and blows away in the wind, Sokka and Katara meet with Malina and Maliq.

paragraphs.body: Cut back to Sokka, who nudges Toph's arm.
paragraphs.text: Cut back to Sokka, who nudges Toph's arm.

paragraphs.body: Cut to Sokka and Toph, running toward Noa, Kam, and Soonjei, who are fighting soldiers on the stage.
paragraphs.text: Cut to Sokka and Toph, running toward Noa, Kam, and Soonjei, who are fighting soldiers on the stage.

paragraphs.body: The scene changes. A short view of the exterior of the Southern water Tribe prison cuts to a dark interior cell block where Gilak sits on his small cot, eyes closed and fists clenched, as if meditating. In the near-darkness, a voice calls his name.
